content.rendered:
This luxurious, nutrient dense bronzing oil deeply hydrates and nourishes the skin while delivering an instantly sun-kissed glow from head to toe.

Pioneering the use of an oil-soluble, patented hyaluronic acid innovation, this works in synergy with a rich botanical complex engineered from Macadamia, Jojoba and Olive, to replenish moisture and improve the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.

It simultaneously balances the skin surface lipid profile to improve the appearance of skin elasticity and firmness while aiding the skin’s natural restorative process.

This fast-absorbing oil contains ultra-fine minerals which glisten on the skin, acting as a flattering skin tone corrector and softly bronzing the skin for a healthy and radiant all-over glow.
